game_description: Meet Playbook: The designer's tool for XR. Quickly go from zero to one with drag-and-drop interactions, one-click design systems, Figma integration, starter scenes, and our pre-made component library. Experience the freedom to design in an environment that feels inviting and remarkably intuitive. We're taking everything that is intuitive about 2D and bringing it into XR to ensure that design-minded creators can build for the Metaverse.
